macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Plunges Below $76,000 in Prolonged Selloff
items.summary: Bitcoin slipped below $76,000, down 40% from its 2025 peak and marking its fourth straight monthly decline, with bears in firm control and analysts predicting no new all-time high in 2026.[3][4]

items.title: SEC and CFTC Launch 'Project Crypto' for Unified Regulation
items.summary: The SEC and CFTC have initiated 'Project Crypto' to harmonize digital asset regulation and modernize market rules, amid ongoing legislative progress.[1]

items.title: White House Summit on Stablecoin Rewards with Coinbase and Ripple
items.summary: Coinbase, Ripple, and industry groups are meeting at the White House to debate stablecoin reward treatment under the CLARITY Act.[1]

items.title: Tether Reports Record $10B Net Profit for 2025
items.summary: Tether achieved over $10 billion in net profits for 2025 while issuing more than $50 billion in new USDT.[1]

items.title: Cryptocurrencies See Mild Rebound with Surging On-Chain Activity
items.summary: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana experienced a mild rebound on February 2, driven by increased on-chain metrics like Ethereum's record daily new addresses and Solana's rising activity.[2]

items.title: Hyperliquid Hits $2.5B in 24-Hour Gold and Silver Volumes
items.summary: Hyperliquid recorded over $2.5 billion in 24-hour volumes for gold and silver contracts, reflecting explosive on-chain macro hedging.[1]

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: AI System Autonomously Runs Multi-Stage Physics Experiment 100x Faster Than Humans
items.summary: Researchers demonstrated an AI system driven by a large language model that autonomously prepared and executed a multi-stage physics experiment on a synchrotron light source, completing setup 100 times faster than human researchers. The Accelerator Assistant uses natural language prompts to find variables, generate code, analyze data, and safely operate complex accelerator instruments.

items.title: DOE's Multi-Office Particle Accelerator Team Develops Cross-Facility AI Infrastructure
items.summary: The MOAT project is building AI tools including digital twins, intelligent assistants, and advanced models to improve particle accelerators across DOE facilities. The initiative aims to make AI tools platform-agnostic so improvements can be shared across national labs, universities, and industry partners.

items.title: Lockheed Martin and Fujitsu Partner on Dual-Use Technology Development
items.summary: The defense contractor and Japanese technology company announced a Memorandum of Understanding to jointly advance quantum computing, edge computing, AI/ML, advanced microelectronics, and next-generation network solutions. The collaboration aims to leverage both companies' expertise to accelerate critical technology development.

items.title: Ambient AI Significantly Reduces Work Exhaustion Among Healthcare Providers
items.summary: A randomized controlled trial of 66 healthcare providers found that ambient AI scribes significantly decreased work exhaustion by 0.44 points and reduced time spent on documentation by 0.36 hours per week. AI-generated notes achieved high accuracy (4.44/5), thoroughness (4.57/5), and usefulness (4.83/5) scores.

items.title: Google DeepMind Researcher David Silver Launches AI Startup Ineffable Intelligence
items.summary: Veteran Google DeepMind researcher David Silver has left the company to form a London-based startup focused on building 'an endlessly learning superintelligence.' The company is recruiting AI researchers and seeking venture capital funding, with Silver emphasizing reinforcement learning as the path to superintelligence.

items.title: Google Emphasizes Teacher Role in Schools Amid AI Adoption Concerns
items.summary: Google is stressing the importance of teachers in educational settings as schools adopt AI tools, attempting to address concerns about cheating and plagiarism while maintaining human oversight in learning environments.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: SpaceX Proposes Million-Satellite Orbital Data Center Expansion
items.summary: SpaceX has applied to launch one million additional satellites to create orbital data centers for enhanced compute and connectivity. The plan raises concerns over orbital congestion, collision risks, and space sustainability.

items.title: CesiumAstro Secures $470M for Satellite Connectivity Expansion
items.summary: CesiumAstro raised $470 million in funding backed by Airbus Ventures and Toyota’s Woven Capital to scale satellite connectivity technology. The investment highlights demand for resilient communications in remote and mission-critical areas.

items.title: Apple Prepares MacBook Pro Refresh Tied to New macOS Cycle
items.summary: Apple is reportedly set to launch upgraded MacBook Pro models soon, aligned with an upcoming macOS update. The refresh focuses on performance for creative, developer, and local processing workloads.

items.title: Wall Street Upgrades Apple, Microsoft, and Shopify Stocks
items.summary: Analysts upgraded Apple (AAPL), Microsoft (MSFT), and Shopify (SHOP) on February 2, 2026, citing strong potential with raised price targets. Other moves include upgrades for McDonald’s and downgrades for Cirrus Logic and Fortinet.
